decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: Existing Front & Rear Elevation and Proposed Ground Floor Plans and Proposed Roof Plan drawing no.02 Rev B, Proposed Side Elevation drawing no.04 Rev B and BRE 45 degree Daylight Assessment drawing no.05 Rev A
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policy D3 of the London Plan (2021), policy DAA of Ealing's Local Plan (Reg.19) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023)(Updated).
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan 2013, policy DAA of Ealing's Local Plan (reg.19), policies D3 and D6 London Plan 2021 and National Planning Policy Framework 2023 (Updated) - section 12 - Achieving well-designed places.
description: Single storey side/rear extension (replacing existing single storey rear extension)
